quoteText: We reserve the right to refuse service, suspend accounts or limit access to the NordVPN Services in our sole discretion. Such suspension or access limitation may be implemented by NordVPN instantly and without any indication, notice or refund. We may suspend your account for clarification, investigation or request you to explain your actions and provide additional information. If your account has been suspended, you must contact us for further information. We may suspend your user account for a reasonable period of time before we terminate a user account permanently.
title: The service can suspend your account for several reasons

tosdr.case: The service can suspend your account for several reasons
